name: ANKLE BOUNCES
introduce:
1.With your legs shoulder-width apart; 
2.rapidly jump up and down, generating the force from your ankles.

name: BACK ROLLS
introduce: Sit on a mat and lock your knees to your chest and lay back into rolling and roll back to sit.

name: BUTT KICKS
FORWARD FOLD
introduce:
1.Clasp your hands behind back, then fold forward, letting head fall toward the ground and gently releasing neck; 
2.Stay for 1 second and back to start.

name: HIGH KNEES SKIPS
JUMPING JACKS
KNEE LIFTS
introduce:
1.Stand up and bring up knees to touch the opposite hand alternately; 
2.Keep your back straight and a slight bend in the supporting leg.

name: LATERAL FLEXION MOTIONS
MARCH ON THE SPOT
introduce:
1.Start off marching on the spot and pump your arms up and down in rhythm with your steps; 
2.keeping the elbows bent and the fists soft.

name: NECK CIRCLES
introduce:
1.Tilt your head to one side, slowly roll backward to raise your chin up; 
2.Continue to roll your head to the other side until you feel stretched.

name: AIR BIKE CRUNCHES
ALT ARM LEG PLANK
introduce:
1.Start in a push up position, raise one arm and the opposite leg at a time; 
2.Hold for a second before repeating on the other side.

name: BOAT
BODY SAW
BOTTOM LEG LIFT LEFT
introduce:
1.Lying on your side, lengthen your bottom leg and cross your top leg over it; 
2.Lift your bottom leg up and lower it back down.

name: BOTTOM LEG LIFT RIGHT
introduce:
1.Lying on your side, lengthen your bottom leg and cross your top leg over it; 
2.Lift your bottom leg up and lower it back down.

name: BRIDGE
BURPEES
BUTT UPS
introduce:
1.Lie down with your knees bent, put you arms on the mat with palms facing down to find balance; 
2.Raise up your legs and hip, trying to reach the straight up position.

name: CLIMBER TAPS
DIVE BOMBERS
introduce:
1.Start in a downward facing position; 
2.Slowly lower your arms and slide your torso forward, then your arms to push your torso up as your hips come toward the ground.

name: ELBOW PLANK
FLUTTER KICKS
introduce:
1.Lie on your back with hands under hips; 
2.Keep legs straight and off the floor, move legs alternately up and down. Repeat.

name: FORWARD LUNGE
HIGH CRUNCHES
HIGH KNEES
HUNDREDS
introduce:
1.Lie on your back with your knees bent, feet lifted and parallel to the floor; 
2.Then reach your arms toward your feet as you lift your head and keep your shoulder off the floor.

name: INCHWORM
INCLINE PUSH-UPS
JACK KNIFES
JUMPING LUNGES
KNEE PUSH UP
KNEE UPS LEFT
introduce:
1.Stand in lunge with your left foot behind you, your hands in running stance; 
2.Quickly bring your left knee toward your chest, and then back to tap the floor.

name: KNEE UPS RIGHT
introduce:
1.Stand in lunge with your right foot behind you, your hands in running stance; 
2.Quickly bring your right knee toward your chest, and then back to tap the floor.

name: KNEELING LEG LIFT LEFT
introduce:
1.Start with your knees and hands on floor; 
2.Extend your left leg behind you, then lift the leg to hip level and then slowly lower it back down.

name: KNEELING LEG LIFT RIGHT
introduce:
1.Start with your knees and hands on floor; 
2.Extend your right leg behind you, then lift the leg to hip level and then slowly lower it back down.

name: LEG HIP RAISE LEFT
LEG HIP RAISE RIGHT
LEG RAISES
introduce:
1.Lie down with hands under hips; 
2.Lift your legs slowly off the ground to a 90 degrees angle, then slowly lower them back several inches off ground.

name: LOWER BACK CURLS
introduce:
1.Lie on your stomach with face down; 
2.Keep your legs hip-distance apart, arms at sides with palms facing up. Lift your upper body off the ground. Slowly lower to start position.

name: MOUNTAIN CLIMBER
MOUNTAIN CLIMBER JUMPS
PLANK
PLANK TO DOWN DOG
REVERSE CRUNCHES
REVERSE PLANK
SHOULDER PULSES
SIDE GLUTE LIFTS LEFT
SIDE GLUTE LIFTS RIGHT
SIDE JACK KNIVES
SIDE LEG RAISE LEFT
SIDE LEG RAISE RIGHT
SIDE PLANKS LEFT
SIDE PLANKS RIGHT
SQUATS
SUPERMAN
TRICEP DIPS
UP AND DOWN PLANKS
WALL SIT
WINDSHIELD WIPERS
introduce:
1.Lie on your back with your arms outstretched and palms facing down; 
2.Lift your legs straight up to 90 degrees and start rotating to left and right.

name: ABDOMINAL STRETCH
CALF STRETCH LEFT
introduce:
1.Stand from a wall, step right foot to touch wall, place hands on wall; 
2.Bend your left knee and lean forward, unbend left leg and press heel into the ground. Hold the position.

name: CALF STRETCH RIGHT
introduce:
1.Stand from a wall, step left foot to touch wall, place hands on wall; 
2.Bend your right knee and lean forward, unbend right leg and press heel into the ground. Hold the position.

name: CAMEL POSE
CAT POSE
QUAD STRETCH LEFT
introduce:
1.Take a step forward with right foot and lower body with left knee on mat; 
2.Pull your left foot to glutes and reach back to feel your quad stretched.

name: QUAD STRETCH RIGHT
introduce:
1.Take a step forward with left foot and lower body with right knee on mat; 
2.Pull your right foot to glutes and reach back to feel your quad stretched.

name: STRADDLE SIT
introduce:
1.Sit on mat with your legs stretched out open to the sides as far as you can; 
2.Place hand on the floor and slowly walk your hands forward until forearms are resting on the floor. Hold the position.

name: TRICEPS STRETCH LEFT
introduce:
1.Reach left arm over your head, bend at the elbow, and place right hand on the left elbow; 
2.Gently pull the left elbow back and hold the position.

name: TRICEPS STRETCH RIGHT
introduce:
1.Reach right arm over your head, bend at the elbow, and place left hand on the right elbow; 
2.Gently pull the right elbow back and hold the position.
